data.name: NewTweet
data.value:
Hey!
There's a new Tweet. Author:

data.name: SourceText
data.value: You can find the Tweet here:

data.name: Quoted
data.value: This is a Quoted post. Quoted Post:

data.name: Reply
data.value: This is a Reply post. Replied Post:

data.name: Retweet
data.value: This is a Retweetd post. Retweeted Post:

data.name: Join
data.value: If you want to stay updated in all things kaspa related don't forget to join or add the bot to your channel.

data.name: StartContent
data.value: Welcome, choose an option

data.name: HelpContent
data.value: Here is a list of all the commands: /start - Register Chat, Set Language and Get Help /help - Gives a list of available commands /language - Allows to set Chat language. Only Chinese and English are available right now. /enable - Allows you to choose which regions you want to receive tweets from /disable - If you decide you don't want tweets from a region anymore you can remove the region here /getEnabled - Prints a list of regions that are posting in this chat /showTweeters - Gives a list of tweeters for your regions /addTweeter - Instructions to add tweeters from other regions. /support - Info to support bot /moveHere - Only for supergroups (forums) - allows to change the preferred topic which the bot will post tweets in /moveHereSingle - Only for supergroups (forums) - Allows you to change the topic for selected regions. Useful if you have different languages and want the bot to post tweets from different languages in different topics

data.name: SetLanguageContent
data.value: Choose one of those Languages

data.name: SetLanguageSuccess
data.value: ✅ Language set successfully

data.name: EnableContent
data.value: Each button allows you to receive tweets from the relative region, only click the button from the regions you want to receive tweets from.

data.name: DisableContent
data.value: Each button stops pushing tweets from its relative region

data.name: EnableContentSuccess
data.value: Region has been enabled successfully

data.name: DisableContentSuccess
data.value: Region has been disconnected successfully

data.name: GetEnabledRegionsContent
data.value: Here is a list of all the regions that are posting tweets in this chat:

data.name: MoveHereSuccess
data.value: Tweets from all registered regions will be posted here

data.name: MoveHereSingle
data.value: Select the languages you want to move here

data.name: MoveHereSingleSuccess
data.value: Tweets from selected region will be posted in this topic

data.name: ShowTweetersContent
data.value: Here is a list of all the tweeters for your regions

data.name: NotAdmin
data.value: You must be an admin to use this bot

data.name: AddTweeterContent
data.value: The process to add a user is manual and can only be done by the bot owner. Contact him directly or fill in this form: https://forms.gle/xjZWvq5scqR8bire6

data.name: SupportContent
data.value: Hello, this bot is written and mantained by a community member. To make this bot possible the owner is also paying out of pocket monthly feet to use twitter APIs. If you think this bot is valuable to you feel free to donate to the following address:
